title: Bisi Ezerioha of BISIMOTO ENGINEERING
description:
Bisi Ezerioha is the best kind of engineer, because he has crazy ideas. Like 1000HP Honda minivans, a Honda Insight built to drag race, and Porsche that shoot lots of fire. He builds cars the come from weird dreams. Today, he tells us the story of how he got here.

 

Check out Bisi's website to follow for builds, parts, and contact: http://bisimoto.com/

Follow Bisi here: https://www.instagram.com/bisimoto/

This show is also available as a video, full of pictures, videos, and other assets pertaining to the conversation. https://youtu.be/nuS9qgqLh_k

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1Follow us!

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
